longBusinessSummary: Tokio Marine Holdings, Inc. engages in the non-life and life insurance, and financial and general businesses in Japan and internationally. It operates through four segments: Domestic Non-Life Insurance Business, Domestic Life Insurance Business, International Insurance Business, and Financial and Other Businesses. The company provides fire and allied lines, hull and cargo, health, personal accident, automobile, and other insurance products, as well as asset management services. It also offers investment advisory, investment trust, staffing, facility management, and nursing care services. The company was formerly known as Millea Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Tokio Marine Holdings, Inc. in 2008. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
